org.modelio.api.module.mda

Interface IMdaExpert


  • public interface IMdaExpert
    The MDA expert tool can answer questions about dependencies between stereotyped metaclass or elements.

    Since:
    3.4

    • Method Summary

      • isMultiple

        default boolean isMultiple(Stereotype linkStereotype)
        Indicates whether or not several instances of a MethodologicalLink can be used at the same time on an element.

        Default value is true.

        Parameters:
        linkStereotype - a Stereotype defined on MethodologicalLink.
        Returns:
        true if several instances can be used, false otherwise.
        Since:
        3.8

      • getPossibleTargetMetaclasses

        default java.util.Collection<MClass> getPossibleTargetMetaclasses(Stereotype linkStereotype,
                                                                  MClass sourceMetaclass)
        Get the possible target metaclasses of a stereotyped link.
        Parameters:
        linkStereotype - a stereotype applicable on a link metaclass. Must not be null.
        sourceMetaclass - the source of the link. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        a list of metaclass that can be used as target for the link in this configuration.
        Since:
        3.8

      • getPossibleSourceMetaclasses

        default java.util.Collection<MClass> getPossibleSourceMetaclasses(Stereotype linkStereotype,
                                                                  MClass targetMetaclass)
        Get the possible source metaclasses of a stereotyped link.
        Parameters:
        linkStereotype - a stereotype applicable on a link metaclass. Must not be null.
        targetMetaclass - the target of the link. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        a list of metaclass that can be used as source for the link in this configuration.
        Since:
        3.8

      • getLinkingRules

        default java.util.Map<ElementScope,java.util.List<ElementScope>> getLinkingRules(Stereotype linkStereotype)
        Get the possible source/target combinations for a stereotyped link.
        Parameters:
        linkStereotype - a stereotype applicable on a link metaclass. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        a map of scopes, where each key is a possible source and its associated values the possible targets.
        Since:
        3.8
